website_summaries.verdict: Cool running bulb can shine brighter than more expensive options due to an intelligent design.
pros: Built-in heat sink works to passively cool the bulb after running a long time at higher intensities
Intelligent computer chip lets the bulb work with active car systems
Can be used for fog lights and other intense operations
cons: Difference between low and high beam settings is smaller than other bulbs

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: So these went into a 2001 Dodge ran 2500 gas, they are good quality just be careful with the little allen key nut. It can be stripped easy, but the install was quick and easy and Bright ? It shows everything on the road or anything near it! Even at 7 at night the light is so visible against a wall from about 10ft back. But great product and am definitely telling friends to buy these
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright
customer_reviews.text: Really really really bright! But can't tell the difference between high and low beams. Still just bright as the sun. I can make out freckles on the faces of oncoming drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bryan

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: Really good.super easy installation, perfect fit.these are really effective- super bright.can't really tell the difference between low and high beam, but the people who flashed me turned their beams right down when I blinked the high beams, so apparently incoming traffic can. I'll post more if anything changes, but for the same cost as a high end Sylvania bulb set (xr) They really do seem better.
customer_reviews.author: paul dalton

customer_reviews.title: Must need. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love these LED Headlights. I have them installed on my 1992 Ford Ranger XLT 2.3l 4cyl. They are so much better than the ones that were factory installed on the truck. This is the second pair that I have bought for my other vehicle. I would highly reccomend this product for any compatible vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Exorcism of the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I purchased these, I’ve been seeing things... crazy things. Things I never knew were there. It’s like there was a veil, blinding me from the truth of what was really out there and these LED’s helped lift that veil and show me the truth. They’re also bright! Like neighbors and oncoming traffic giving you the bird, bright. They’re a godsend and help fuel my rivalry with my ‘cross-the-way’ neighbors Charlie and Lenore. I’m winning now because of these amazing contraptions of magic and light! Be on the winning side and purchase these now!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great value for BRIGHT lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of LED lights from another company for my 05 Altima, but with shipping, they were a little over $100. I decided to look on Amazon for a set for my 01 Xterra. Going by reviews, I picked these. Super easy to install, and put out an amazing amount of nice, bright, white light. My only complaint would be that the high beams aren't really any brighter than the lows. Inconsequential really, as the low beams are orders of magnitude brighter than the factory high beams were. I guess the aim is ok, because even being a taller 4x4, I haven't had anyone flash their lights at me yet, thinking my high beams were on.
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Jewel

customer_reviews.title: The problem with LEDs
customer_reviews.text: It was hard enough finding a set that would work with my factory headlight retainers but now, they seem to always be on "high Beam" setting and when i change to high beam on my dash, they get dimmer (like low beam). I'm sure I need to mess with the wiring and relays to get it sorted out. Just a warning to anyone else, LED's use less electricity and the vehicle is set up to supply a set amount of voltage to the headlights. Some vehicles may not produce the correct amount for these (or any) aftermarket LED headlight kits. Be warned, you might have to have them professionally installed so the workers can fix any voltage issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D.

customer_reviews.title: Almost feel sorry for the cars I pass......almost
customer_reviews.text: I put these lights on an '89 Ford...not known for outstanding headlight quality. The stock headlights were so bad, it was hard to tell when they were even on unless it was pitch black. I put these on and I am shocked at how bright they are. I have a 24" lightbar mounted on the bumper and these lights rival it. If they were any brighter I would not feel comfortable running them. They will definitely make you "that person" that blinds everyone else. I do not drive the truck much and then it is mainly rural roads so I am ok with it. Definitely safer when winter time gets here and the deer are out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Longevity
customer_reviews.text: Have this brand of LED headlight bulbs in all my vehicles and have had the same pair in each car since purchased. Never replaced, no issues, super bright white LED. Each bulb comes with built in fan for cooling. Great product, High Quality. Definitely recommend for anyone. FYI: Most other drivers will assume you have your brights on at all times and will flash lights at you constantly. Great overall vision covering surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Correia

customer_reviews.title: LED Headlights
customer_reviews.text: I installed these LED's without any problems in my 1993 Jeep Grand Cherokee and they performed as advertised. They were much brighter than the old halogens. Switching from dims to brights however provided very little difference but since I never use the brights it was not significant. These units plug into the existing hardware and line up with the alignment notches without any modifications. JJK
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great headlights. Wrecked my truck but these lights never quit.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Casler

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: The first set had a hard time to turn on after a few time of turning on and off the switch they stayed on and work for a few day and then they stop working one night. 2nd set that i got one to work the other made a short on my switch. They didn't work for me maybe you'll get better luck
customer_reviews.author: Renato Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you double check the style of light
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a christmas present, and in doing so using does this fit your car screen wasn't as detailed as needs to be. It had up to New Yorker style but didn't go far enough to include fifth ave type. Found out fifth ave is different and requires 4 sealed beams instead of the type ordered. I sure they are a good product and work fine in the right car. Just sent back and will order sealed hi and lo beams instead
customer_reviews.author: osh1998

customer_reviews.title: One light worked the other did not.
customer_reviews.text: When I installed this product the first light worked great but, when I installed the second light it was extremely dim and the cooling fan did not work. Very disappointed and will not buy or recommend this product to any one. Its to late to get a refund or replacement due to the fact I just finish restoring my truck and then installed the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeal

customer_reviews.title: Turns night into day
customer_reviews.text: Nuclear bright even in low beam, but that’s perfect for my set up. I bought these for an off-road rig to light up the trails. Be ready to get flashed by other drivers on the highway. I chuckle when they do it, and momentarily throw the lights into Hiroshima (high) mode. Draw way less power than old bulbs as well.
customer_reviews.author: KSminibike

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Would recommend to anyone with bad headlights on their car
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the top five upgrades I've ever done to a vehicle. These were inexpensive, their build quality is good, and took mere minutes to install. I can now see clearly when driving at night and I'm no longer concerned about burned out headlights as these will likely outlast the life of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Well its been a couple of months I’ve had these ...
customer_reviews.text: Well its been a couple of months I’ve had these headlights i dont know if I had a deffective pair or not but today one of light just blew out. Very dissapointed with my purchase for these.
customer_reviews.author: Omaira C.

customer_reviews.title: Work great, somewhat adjustable. Beware there is no warranty support
customer_reviews.text: They are super bright with some adjustability. Would give a 5-star but there is now way to see information about a warranty and no way to contact the company short of mailing a letter to CHINA. I thought I had an issue with a bulb which would have been a warranty issue, and had that been the case I would have been totally screwed. Thankfully that wasn't the case and both lights work great, but if I were to do it again I'd pick a company with a warranty just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAggie

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: These go in just like a regular halogen, although a little coercion was needed to get the factory retaining rings to work with them. Once in, they are brighter than halogen bulbs, and I am satisfied. Not sure yet how well the fans will work, as I just got them in and haven't operated them that long but we will see. Same for the longevity, I don't know yet, I'm just commenting on how well they fit and appear to be.
customer_reviews.author: Denne Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement to upgrade your standard light bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: These led bulbs are noticeably brighter than what I took out. They do stick out quiet a bit further, so there needs to be approximately three to four inches of space behind the light in order for these bulbs to work.
customer_reviews.author: autotech

customer_reviews.title: they work sort of .....
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on a 2000 Xterra , turned em on and wow there bright ! but thats the problem , low beam is high beam , when high beam is engaged they dim . I know what your thinking flip the plug , Nope you cant they only fit one way . going back to HID
customer_reviews.author: cowpig

customer_reviews.title: Still like how bright an wide it throws the light I also levelled it so it don't blind people
customer_reviews.text: I like them only now the fogs don't work an there wasn't anything added to allow the fog light to still turn on also fogs has new leds as well tested outside to be sure they work when I go to turn on the fog lights it turns on the high beams instead
customer_reviews.author: Lakeram

customer_reviews.title: Good choise
customer_reviews.text: Bought the headlights for my grandson to replace the old lights on his 2000 Dodge 4X4 that he is fixing up. He installed them and they work great with the new LED lights. Had to remove a not needed screw mount tab to install with out forcing them into place but other than that it was easy. There could have been better instructions on connecting the LED running lights, there are many ways this could be done.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Bailey

customer_reviews.title: OK, this seriously is bright. Seriously. Put ...
customer_reviews.text: OK, this seriously is bright. Seriously. Put them in a 99 Chevy Venture and it's, well, "night and day" in the difference. One oddity that I've noticed is that there seems to be only a slight difference between normal and brights with this, but I don't care, given how serious the "normals" are.
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: holy crap these are bright!
customer_reviews.text: wow. bright. what can i say! like other LED lights the low beam throws more light than the high beam. Only had them in for a bit so i can't comment on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: r570sv

customer_reviews.title: Lights the rode up well
customer_reviews.text: Easy install replaced both headlights with aftermarket lights and these bulbs in less than 30 min taking my time, very happy with how well i can see at night in my 96 12v cummins. Be sure if your doing a complete headlight swap to put them in while the headlight is out so all you need to do connect the plug once installed, can be done without removing light but less chance of damaging them and more convenient while its out. 5 stars so far the true test will be to see how long they last
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: A buddy bought these and after seeing them in his Tahoe I had to have these. They are super bright and plug right up. If u give a bad review on these about not fitting it's probably because ur to stupid to get the right bulb for ur car. If u complain about the flicker it clearly tells u that u may have to buy an anti-flicker wire to solve this. So again if u give a bad review ur stupid. Thanks again for an awesome, bright light
customer_reviews.author: Traye Tetstone

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old halogen headlights in my 1994 Dodge Ram 1500 4x4. Had little problems with the change over and what a difference. Lights the world with them.
customer_reviews.author: C Breeden

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Bright
customer_reviews.text: I put them in my 2nd gen Dodge 2500 . One was bad, but they sent me another one right away. You had to turn them 180 degrees in the collor to work on the Dodge, but then it's a nice bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Bright, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The first set I ordered didnt even turn on, and the second was junk too. They turned on, but one high beam cones on with the low beams and both shut off when the high beams come on. Also, the fans have gotten progressively louder.
customer_reviews.author: smish

customer_reviews.title: Good bright lights
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright lights, better than expected. I had another ones for my SUV and they last only for about 6 months. I hope this ones last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Bran

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Vission
customer_reviews.text: So far, so Good ... Really increased visibility 10 fold, So much better than regular factory head lamps/bulbs. Easier on the eyes of oncoming traffic as well...
customer_reviews.author: Wheel Chair Mike

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH LIGHTS 100%
customer_reviews.text: THESE LIGHTS ARE SUPER BRIGHT.I'VE USED HID LAMPS IN THE PASS BUT THESE ARE AWESOME.I INSTALLED IN MY 1999 DOSGE RAM 2500 TRUCK THE BULBS IN THESE 2ND GEN DODGES ARE SUPER HARD TO REPLACE AND THESE LEDS ARE A REALLY TIGHT FIT BUT WITH SOME HARD PUSHING INTO THE OEM "RING" ITLL FIT BEFORE MY LIGHTS WHERE SO DULL I COULDN'T SEE AT NIGHT.NOW IT'S RIDICULOUSLY BRIGHT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: F Plancarte

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: The Lights work, but mine seem to be on brights when normal lights are on and when i switch to brights it goes to the normal lights. Other than that they are great and a super bright white.
customer_reviews.author: Niklaus

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2nd gen dodge.
customer_reviews.text: Although indicated otherwise by Amazon, these bulbs do not fit a 1996 dodge ram 2500. You will break/crack the bulb retaining ring if you try to force fit the bulb into the head light bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt happy at all I guess you get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt happy at all I guess you get what you pay for. Horrible fitment on my 96 impala they wont stay n the headlight housing and the so called adjustable positioning is a joke screw doesnt do anything but allow you to strip it due to the fact its stuck in there. Both I was unable to adjust with screw and yes I used correct size Allen key. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Big difference
customer_reviews.text: These led lights made a huge difference in visibility on my ‘91 MBZ 500SL The color of the light is much whiter and brighter than the replacement hid lights I had previously installed. Easy to install and have worked perfectly so far.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Bight and wide beams
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are super bright and work well. Really can see everything how ever i really feel like i might be blinding folks. I have those old school Square glass housing headlamps. Really no difference in the high and low beams aswell. But im happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Ray of brightness
customer_reviews.text: So bright! Love it. The brightness spreads to the streets. It’s not like drop light (like other LED). The ray spreads. And I like it liket that.
customer_reviews.author: Myk A.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright with excellent clarity
customer_reviews.text: Can be adjusted so bright is fantastic and dim does not blind incoming traffic
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Big Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in an old Volkswagen Van. I went from candle light to being able to see at night.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Renner

customer_reviews.title: No real High Beams
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install. The lights are very bright, downside is that there is very little to no difference between hi and low beam. I tried to install them the way that factory said to and had NO hi beam, so I flipped the bulbs and was able to see that I did have hi beams but like I said there is little to no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright and low beams almost identical
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 1981 F150. Noticed right away that the high and low beams are almost identical. Low beam is much too bright for driving in traffic, dangerously so.
customer_reviews.author: BBD

customer_reviews.title: amazing how they light up mountain roads
customer_reviews.text: Lil tricky installing in my 96 Toyota, had to use the Allen key that came with to remove the back so I could use the original retainer ring on my car. But ...WOW...amazing how they light up mountain roads.
customer_reviews.author: Firedutyonly

customer_reviews.title: A good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product. I had to do a little modification to the housing to be able to lock the lights into place. I have a little trouble with getting the light in the right location to allow the high beam to be effective. Overall the product seems very good and the turn around time from order to delivery was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Mason

customer_reviews.title: Bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have made it 5 stars but there is very little difference between low beam and high beam, these lights are very very easy to install, and wow are they bright, looks like I have my light bar on, so far I haven’t had people flash me surprisingly, so the beam must be perfect on my rig, 1997 Jeep Grand Cherokee
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new LED bulb replacements.
customer_reviews.text: These LED lights work great and are so bright I do not even use my 70 watt LED light anymore. I am very happy with them and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: JustSteve

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom in her Toyota previa, she loves them
customer_reviews.author: caleb springer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Worked great, plug and play. Wish high beams worked a bit better but still bright as heck
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: One light only lasted an hour tops
customer_reviews.text: I received these lights fast and they were very easy to install. Unfortunately they only lasted about an hour as one of the lights went out in low beam but high beam still works. Very disappointed with this buy as I was excited at first but due to one light failing i am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Aldaz

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: By far the brightest most consistent headlights I've seen. I've tried 2 sets of HIDs and 2 sets of halogens, none of which were comparable to the bright, wide view provided by these lights. I've only had a few days but they've been worth it already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lights. Have had them on our 1990 VW ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Have had them on our 1990 VW Vanagon for about 5 months. Every time we turn on the lights we talk about how well they work.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BULBS
customer_reviews.text: wow I can see again work perfectly in my 1997 Jeep just made me a happy to be able to see everything.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's suppose to.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like that these lights, atleast for the 9004 bulb is designed so that the low beam is brighter than the high beam. Defeats the purpose of having a high beam. Still a good product though.
customer_reviews.author: Austin3324

customer_reviews.title: THE LED BULB DOES FIT MY 1991 NISSAN MAXIMA, THE STOPPER FLANGE IS 2.00 MM JUST LIKE THE STOCK BULBS
customer_reviews.text: The retainer ring moved and locked in place. There is no Low or High beams, they're all the same pattern.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: I installed them in my 92 Foxbody Mustang they are very bright can't tell any difference between low and high beam.
customer_reviews.author: James Melton

customer_reviews.title: Crispy Clean White Lights
customer_reviews.text: Ima blind you it’s awesomely bright Just what the roads need!!
customer_reviews.author: TEXASHUZTLA

customer_reviews.title: The low beam and high beam are reversed. Can ...
customer_reviews.text: The low beam and high beam are reversed. Can switch them. Customer service had no idea what I was talking about, even with a picture and explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue i could find is the fact that there is almost no notable difference between low beam and high beam. Beyond that id have to say they work great. I not only would recommend this product, i will be buying 2 more sets in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: lights are too bright the blind oncoming traffic
customer_reviews.text: i used these in my 1988 mustang there is no difference when brights are turned on.
customer_reviews.author: howard

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Took longer to arrive than anticipated (seller did offer a discount). Could never seem to get the lighting pattern correct even after adjusting headlights. Other drivers were constantly flashing highbeams at me. Right light started to flicker after a year and 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brade

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright like I wanted, but my bright switch doesn't seem to turn the third LED on, installed all correctly and can't flip a quarter round plug around but it still works fine,don't need to have the brights.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: bright AF.... but....
customer_reviews.text: Bright AF but the adjustment screws all stripped to easy so my lows are high and my highs are low...
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: bright as the sun
customer_reviews.text: love these headlights they are so much brighter then my hid's I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Gino Covello Jr

customer_reviews.title: Would give 5 stars but
customer_reviews.text: Work great but don't notice any difference when I turn on the high beams
customer_reviews.author: Jim Novack

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This will light up your night. These bulbs turn night into day.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Mayka

customer_reviews.title: One Bright Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately didn't install on my car until after the return window had closed. On one side, the bright light didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Owens

customer_reviews.title: Bright LED Heasdlights
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these lights. They give off great light and at a good distance. Recommend them highly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my husbands car. He loves them. Very bright. Would definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great I’m my 98 Dodge Ram 1500. Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nelms

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. They completed the look of my truck and they definitely work! They are bright and now I can finally see the whole road.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Empey

customer_reviews.title: This product needs more testing before shipping to consumers.
customer_reviews.text: I like how bright they are but there is no difference between highbeam and low beam. Low beam seems to bright.
customer_reviews.author: steve graven

customer_reviews.title: High and low beams wired backwards!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, lots of down road light. However, internally wired wrong, low beams are high beams. So, as a result you have to drive with the bright light indicator glaring at you on the dash or blind everyone else on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Probst

customer_reviews.title: Very bright. Not sure if high and low beams ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Not sure if high and low beams are crossed somehow. Never seen one with an adjustment before,but now I can definitely see where I'm going.
customer_reviews.author: Atkinson International CODA.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SUPER SUPER bright white light, MUCH better that the stock yellowish OEM lights
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good lights worked well
customer_reviews.text: I like how bright these are I dont like how the high beam is almost not noticed when turned on
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Bright headlights
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, much brighter than my original headlights. Just hope they last as long as my original ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: good buy if you need like
customer_reviews.text: the stock lights in dodge were too dark that i had to run high beams all the time but since i put these in i can see the road
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: High beams don’t work
customer_reviews.text: High beams not as bright I read the instructions and says it’s normal but according to DOT it needs to be brighter than low beams
customer_reviews.author: Rigo

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and white, but not concentrated, very spread out
customer_reviews.text: The fit isn't snug like a pair of Sylvania bulbs and it's too bright if you don't have project style headlights, but very bright and white and easy plug-n-play.
customer_reviews.author: Orlandoperez

customer_reviews.title: Good at first. Not for the long run
customer_reviews.text: These lights were good at first not very bright but they were strong at first. Only lasted me 9 months installed. Then they went out.
customer_reviews.author: RIDER 817

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to turn them the right way
customer_reviews.text: Great product, plug and play. Very light and had no porplem with people blinding other people.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 1996 Dodge ram 2500 and have been more than happy with them. They are very bright and easy to install. Only 4 starts because I haven't had them for long enough to see how well they hold up, but I'd say they are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Correct vehicula
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and worked. Much brighter than original lights.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lester

customer_reviews.title: Great option for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the cooling fan option on this bulb and the three led find instead of the usual two on other bulbs. Installed them on a 1988 Toyota Camry.
customer_reviews.author: David Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Looking for bright lights? Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights for my truck because the factory lights weren’t bright enough. They are definitely worth the money. Very very bright and just what I wanted. I’d recommend these lights to anyone. Very satisfied with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PerfectQuality
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly fine on my 98 ram!! I definitely recommend to anyone 🤘🏼
customer_reviews.author: Jose munoz

customer_reviews.title: Work amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Came very fast ! I put them on my Jeep and they look amazing. My mother and brother are now going to buy these .!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Installed lites easy to install but hibeams are lower than low beams
customer_reviews.author: jesse bush

customer_reviews.title: Really bright !
customer_reviews.text: It’s was really easy ! Love it ... it’s so bright !!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: These are awesomely bright white lights, huge improvement over the 9004 bulbs. Straight forward instructions easy plug and play installation.
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Welcome the brightness
customer_reviews.text: Alot brighter than my factory lights. Difference is night and day. Great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Perez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I had to take the collar around the bulb off to fit it in my 2001 dodge ram They did not give species instructions in the manual
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very bright
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product even with my dirty light covers they are still bright
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Allen jr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like them, good quality I haven't had any problems with them. And it's being almost a year.

customer_reviews.title: Bright

product_meta.title: VoRock8 R2 COB 9004 HB1 8000 Lumens Led Headlight Conversion Kit, High Low Beam Headlamp, Dual Beam Head Light, Halogen Head Light Replacement, 6500K Xenon White, 1 Pair
feature_bullets: 💡【Pls Check the Video】SMALLEST Led kit with the brightest light of its size: 4000lm output each.8000LM per Pair. Can fit inside most cars because of its size,no more modification required on the headlight housing or cover.COB Chip focused beam technology, Perfect Light Pattern without dark spot.6000-6500K white, for street driving.

💡【Fitment】9004,HB1. Aftermarket LED Headlights, perfect replacement for Halogen Lights.Apply to Hi/Lo Beam headlamp, Dual beam headlight etc.【All bulbs are without CANBUS-Ready. Some cars require decoder or resistors to be installed to avoid the flicker or warning, ask us for sure which is the right solution if you had related problem】

💡【Check the "Note" after you entered the car info】You need to put the car year make model info into Amazon garage, then check fit, there is a "Note" below your car info saying where exactly the bulb model can fit. you need to buy the right part number for the right position. if you need headlight, amazon recommended fog light to you, and you did not check the NOTE, you will find it NOT FIT since you install it in the wrong position, pls contact us if you are not 100% sure which bulb you need.
💡【Feature】Cold-pressed Aviation grade aluminum heat sink with built-in 2 ball fan for optimal heat dissipation.All in One Plug & play design,Compact Design with Built in Driver/Ballast.

💡【Light Pattern】This Dual beam bulb has 3 sides of LED chips, 2 sides as low beam and 1 side as high beam, so this bulb is featured for its wide and bright low beam light, low beam is more frequently used for daily driving. so if you find its high beam is not as bright as low beam, this is normal.

specifications.Special Features: Bridge LUX Chip,8000LM/36W, 6500k white, 12V-24V, IP65, 360 degree light angle,?JP 2 ball fan cooling system.
